title: How To Waste $60 on Amazon...
description: Check out the UltraWide Festival!  Sub Quest 2 Giveaway:  LG UltraWide Monitor 34UC89 :  Klipsch K6i headphones on Amazon:  dB MAGIX Lightning headphone amp on Amazon:  Pebble Time smartwatch on Amazon:  USB Pet Rock on Amazon:  Yongnuo 50mm f/1.8 camera lens on Amazon:  POWERUP 3.0 smartphone paper airplane on Amazon:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
